name: @f0rsak3n1598/zara-tunnel
description: High-performance, secure multiprotocol tunneling for the Bun era. Built for developers who need speed and simplicity.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && bun build ./apps/agent/src/index.ts --outfile dist/agent.js --bundle --target bun && bun build ./apps/relay/src/index.ts --outfile dist/relay.js --bundle --target bun && bun build ./src/cli.ts --outfile dist/cli.js --bundle --target bun && chmod +x dist/cli.js
